column2: "Oh, hello there. It is I, Huey the sixth in the Council of Six!"
"...I suck? Don't worry, I'm well aware of that! I get yelled at by Regius all of the time!"
"He's always saying, \"there's someone that suddenly appears on the battle field, shouts and then runs away\"."
"It's not me! It's really not me! I know, next time he yells at me, I'll blame it on you!"
"There's no way for me to go against Regius. He's too high of a rank not follow his orders..."
"He's in the top Three Heroes of the Council of Six, number one overall. A living legend!"
"By himself he's unbelievably powerful, and on top of that he has the [World Ender]! There's no way I can think of beating him!"
"He's too strong. Plus, both he, and his little sister have forty years of battle experience!"
"It would be nice to face him and leave my name in history! I'll make it happen!"
"But for now, I guess those are just empty words. See you later!"
